basics.name: Nam Phong Duong
basics.label: PhD Candidate at Kyoto Institute of Technology

work.name: Image Processing Laboratory, Kyoto Institute of Technology
work.summary: Exploring computer-aided-diagnosis ML-based evaluation methods for breast reconstruction outcomes.

work.name: SUGAR Network for Design Innovation
work.summary: A nine-month design thinking program at the Kyoto Institute of Technology dedicated to developing innovative products and services. Leading companies challenge teams of students from the best universities around the world with open-ended project briefs.

education.institution: KYOTO Design Lab, Kyoto Institute of Technology

awards.title: The Institution Best Student
awards.summary: Awarded for highest academic performance in Mechatronic Engineering in the 2022 graduating cohort at Lancaster University.

publications.name: A New Integrated Medical-Image Processing System with High Clinical Applicability for Effective Dataset Preparation in ML-Based Diagnosis
Integrated Dataset-Preparation System for ML-Based Medical Image Diagnosis with High Clinical Applicability in Various Modalities and Diagnoses

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
